DOC.brief_title: S0309 , Repository : Blood/Bone Marrow From Pts . With Myeloma , WM , Amyloidosis , MGUS .
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Maintain expand tissue repository myeloma specimen uniformly treat Southwest Oncology Group ( SWOG ) patient multiple myeloma , smolder myeloma , Waldenstrom 's macroglobulinemia , amyloidosis , monoclonal gammopathy undetermined significance . - Utilize scientific information generate intergroup collaborative study assist SWOG Myeloma Committee development new effective treatment regimens patient . OUTLINE : Patients receive treatment direct treatment protocol register . Specimens blood and/or marrow submit Myeloma Repository . The status patient ( e.g. , pre-study , post-remission , relapse ) record prior specimen collection . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : Not specify
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Diagnosis 1 following : Multiple myeloma Smoldering myeloma Waldenstrom 's macroglobulinemia Amyloidosis Monoclonal gammopathy undetermined significance Must currently register Southwest Oncology Groupcoordinated treatment study ( SWOG Intergroup ) Must pretreatment specimens submit study No cytogenetic sample PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Not specify PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : Not specify
